history.proof: intros h. pose (bool_f := fun x => if h x then true else false). exists bool_f. intros x. split. - intros px. unfold bool_f. destruct (h x) as [px_true | px_false]. + reflexivity. + exfalso. apply px_false. auto. - intros fx_true. unfold bool_f in fx_true. destruct (h x) as [px_true | px_false]. + auto. + discriminate fx_true.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
X: Type
p: X -> Prop

Goal:
(forall x : X, dec (p x)) -> {f : X -> bool | forall x : X, p x <-> f x = true}

Premises:
dec = fun X : Prop => {X} + {~ X} : Prop -> Type Arguments dec _%type_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
dependent_choice : forall (X : Set) (R : X -> X -> Prop), (forall x : X, {y : X | R x y}) -> forall x0 : X, {f : nat -> X | f 0 = x0 /\ (forall n : nat, R (f n) (f (S n)))}
semi_decider = fun (X : Type) (f : X -> nat -> bool) (P : X -> Prop) => forall x : X, P x < -> (exists n : nat, f x n = true) : forall X : Type, (X -> nat -> bool) -> (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments semi_decider {X}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
enumerator = fun (X : Type) (f : nat -> option X) (P : X -> Prop) => forall x : X, P x < -> (exists n : nat, f n = Some x) : forall X : Type, (nat -> option X) -> (X -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments enumerator {X}%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope
bool_choice : forall (S : Set) (R1 R2 : S -> Prop), (forall x : S, {R1 x} + {R2 x}) -> {f : S -> bool | forall x : S, f x = true /\ R1 x \/ f x = false /\ R2 x}
ssrbool.all_sig_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, Datatypes.is_true (C x) -> {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, Datatypes.is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
ssrfun.all_sig : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (P : forall x : I, T x -> Prop), (forall x : I, {y : T x | P x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x | forall x : I, P x (f x)}
ssrbool.all_tag_cond_dep : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (U : forall x : I, T x -> Type), (forall x : I, T x) -> (forall x : I, Datatypes.is_true (C x) -> {y : T x & U x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x & forall x : I, Datatypes.is_true (C x) -> U x (f x)}
ssrfun.s2valP : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?P (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.s2valP' : forall u : {x : ?T | ?P x & ?Q x}, ?Q (ssrfun.s2val u) where ?T : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?T -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?T -> Prop]
ssrfun.all_tag : forall (I : Type) (T : I -> Type) (U : forall x : I, T x -> Type), (forall x : I, {y : T x & U x y}) -> {f : forall x : I, T x & forall x : I, U x (f x)}
ssrbool.all_sig_cond : forall (I T : Type) (C : ssrbool.pred I) (P : I -> T -> Prop), T -> (forall x : I, Datatypes.is_true (C x) -> {y : T | P x y}) -> {f : I -> T | forall x : I, Datatypes.is_true (C x) -> P x (f x)}
iff_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X <-> Y)
exists_to_inhabited_sig : (exists x : ?A, ?P x) -> inhabited {x : ?A | ?P x} where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop]
Choice : forall (S S' : Set) (R : S -> S' -> Prop), (forall x : S, {y : S' | R x y}) -> {f : S -> S' | forall z : S, R z (f z)}
eq_sig2_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?Q x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, u = v < -> sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop]
ZifyClasses.op_iff : forall p1 p2 q1 q2 : Prop, p1 < -> q1 -> p2 < -> q2 -> ?Op p1 p2 < -> ?Op q1 q2 where ?Op : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Prop -> Prop -> Prop] ?PropOp : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ZifyClasses.PropOp ?Op]
eq_sig_hprop_iff : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?P x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, u = v < -> proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop]
ssrbool.classic_pick : forall (T : Type) (P : T -> Prop), ssrbool.classically ({x : T | P x} + (forall x : T, ~ P x))
eq_sig2_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?Q x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a & ?Q a}, sig_of_sig2 u = sig_of_sig2 v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop] ?Q : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop]
rew_sig : forall (Q : forall a : ?A, ?P a -> Prop) (u : {p0 : ?P ?x | Q ?x p0}) (y : ?A) (H : ?x = y), eq_rect ?x (fun a : ?A => {p : ?P a | Q a p}) u y H = exist (Q y) (eq_rect ?x ?P (proj1_sig u) y H) match H as x in (_ = a) return (Q a (eq_rect ?x ?P (proj1_sig u) a x)) with | eq_refl => proj2_sig u end where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?x : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Type]
impl_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X -> Y)
eq_sig_rect : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_ind : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Prop, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p0 : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p0 = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p0 q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- {a : ?A | ?P a}] ?v : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
Dec : forall X : Prop, dec X -> dec X
EqdepFacts.eq_sig_iff_eq_dep : forall (U : Type) (P : U -> Prop) (p q : U) (x : P p) (y : P q), exist P p x = exist P q y < -> EqdepFacts.eq_dep U P p x q y
eq_sig_hprop : (forall (x : ?A) (p0 q : ?P x), p0 = q) -> forall u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}, proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- Type] ?P : [X : Type p : X -> Prop |- ?A -> Prop]
dec_DN : forall X : Prop, dec X -> ~ ~ X -> X
dec_DM_impl : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> ~ (X -> Y) -> X /\ ~ Y
or_dec : forall X Y : Prop, dec X -> dec Y -> dec (X \/ Y)

```coq
intros h.
pose (bool_f := fun x => if h x then true else false).
exists bool_f.
intros x.
split.
- intros px.
  unfold bool_f.
  destruct (h x) as [px_true | px_false].
  + reflexivity.
  + exfalso. apply px_false. assumption.
- intros fx_true.
  unfold bool_f in fx_true.
  destruct (h x) as [px_true | px_false].
  + assumption.
  + discriminate fx_true.
Qed.
```

original: intros h. pose (bool_f := fun x => if h x then true else false). exists bool_f. intros x. split. - intros px. unfold bool_f. destruct (h x) as [px_true | px_false]. + reflexivity. + exfalso. apply px_false. auto. - intros fx_true. unfold bool_f in fx_true. destruct (h x) as [px_true | px_false]. + auto. + discriminate fx_true.
